Articles.Content:
Perhaps we could develop an orchestral score for Kerbal Space Program?

I have an idea for one, but I wouldn\'t have the resources to get it performed, or perhaps even arrange it.

Oh well.

Thoughts?

If you are talking about music, you *can* get one drawn up and synthesized on your computer. It won\'t sound perfect, but you can get it to sound like whatever you want. Then, perhaps someone else can arrange it to be played & recorded. A free program for this purpose is MuseScore, and a top-of-the-range, expensive professional program is Finale Notepad. Google them, see what they can do, see if the free one will suit your needs. If not, keep looking. I know there are many out there.

Oh, and... have a play with them and make sure you know what you\'re doing before you attempt to actually make the score. The programs all work a little differently.
Oh, it\'s fun alright. Actually getting it to sound like what you want can be a bit of a challenge, but it is indeed quite fun
